title: Sir John Major – 2023 Comments at Warrington Memorial Service
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sir John Major in Warrington on 20 March 2023.
content:
I feel honoured to be with you in Warrington this morning: commemorating that dark and desperate day exactly 30 years ago …. almost to the minute.
